1: <pb/>Re' Lemuel xwihik cho chi reyil ar Masa, xuq'or nik' wach ruq'ilariik xb'aan ruum i rutuut je' wili xuq'or weh:
2: <pb/><t>Hat wak'uun, xatruyeew cho weh i Dios,</t> <t>re' hin ma' xta chik tokoom inwaaj nuq'orom aweh.</t>
3: <pb/><t>Re' chi maayeew chi re' chi ma' re' awansil kuuk' i k'oyoom laj ixoq,</t> <t>ruum re' taqe re' inq'eb'wik keh i reey.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Chakoj rehtaal i hat Lemuel chi re' taqe reey,</t> <t>re' taqe i wilkeeb' chi taaq'anik,</t> <t>ma' ruk'ul taj chi neenkuk'ej keh i k'ahlaj ha',</t>
5: <t>ruum wi xkuk'ej keh ma' nee ta chik inki a'n i ruq'or i k'uhb'aal.</t> <t>Eh neenkian ti' k'axik keh i xati' wo' kik'ux.</t>
6: <t>Re' taqe k'ahlaj ha' xa re' taqe i ti' wilkeeb'</t> <t>i xa nyot'ik chik i kik'ux kiuk'inik reh.</t>
7: <t>Re' taqe re' inkuk'ej taqe k'ahlaj ha',</t> <t>re' nkaaj i keh chi neensahchik pankik'ux i kineb'a'il, i kik'axkiil.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Kow tiq'oroq chikiij i ma' kichol ta q'orik,</t> <t>chako'leej taqe i ma' nee ta nkian ruko'ljiik kiib'</t>
9: <t>Kow tiq'oroq chikiij, re' i rub'ehel cha a'n kuuk' i neb'aa',</t> <t>je' wo' kuuk' i xama' nimaq ta kiwach, inki.</t>
10: <t>Re' jino'q iixoq holohik runa'ojb'al k'axik chi reqarik</t> <t>xiik' naah k'ihaal tz'aaq chuwach i holohaq perla karena.</t>
11: <t>Re' rub'ahiil ch'iklik ruk'ux ruuk',</t> <t>eh nee ruyeew reh i rub'ahiil chu'nchel chib'ih iraaj.</t>
12: <t>Eh chu'nchel q'iij i ruk'achariik i ruch'ikaa' ruk'ux</t> <t>i rub'ahiil ruuk' taqe chib'ih iraaj.</t>
13: <t>Re' i ehk'eenb'ees re' re', inooj chusik'ariik i lana, i lino,</t> <t>eh xa runik'eej chik ru q'iij noq inokik chukemariik.</t>
14: <t>Re' reh i rub'an je' rukab' i rub'an i barco b'ehlan ihq</t> <t>kochinajt i ruk'am chaloq taqe i ajwaal wach chi reh.</t>
15: <t>Eh noq xakomajaa' wo' insaq'ik</t> <t>i ruket lom taqe i rak'uun rixq'uun,</t> <t>taqe i raj pooh ixoq.</t>
16: <t>Re' reh inooj chi rilariik junseht-oq i ye'aab'</t> <t>i ruloq' ruuk' i rutumiin, eh i rutik i uuva chupaam.</t>
17: <t>Eh wilik rukowiil chi korik,</t> <t>ma' ruk'ay taj noq inokik chi kamanik.</t>
18: <t>Eh rilow mi ma' xta reet ojik i rub'an i ruyak</t> <t>eh injohtik aq'ab' chi kamanik, i ruqop rusaqumb'aal chub'aan.</t>
19: <t>Ruuk' wo' q'ab' i reh i ruq'in i runooq'</t> <t>eh i rukem wach.</t>
20: <t>Re' i ehk'eenb'ees re' re' ma' pixp taj i rutoob'eej taqe</t> <t>neb'aa' je' wo' taqe i ma' xta ilil keh.</t>
21: <t>Re' reh ma' ruyohleej ta taqe i rak'uun rixq'uun noq inchalik i ruq'ijil jab'</t> <t>ruum k'ih tah i kiso' rukojom chi kunchelaal.</t>
22: <t>Eh xa re' reh inkemwik taqe i ruchamaar,</t> <t>xiik' naah k'ihaal tz'aaq taqe ruso' rukoj.</t>
23: <t>Re' i rub'ahiil xanoq wo' naab'jik wach chupaam i tinamit.</t> <t>Eh inwihik chi kixilak i nimaq kiwach wilkeeb' chupaam i tinamit.</t>
24: <t>Re' ehk'eenb'ees re' re' i ruyejaa' i kiso' i tinamit,</t> <t>i b'ak'b'al pamis, i ruk'ayej keh i aj yakool.</t>
25: <t>Re' reh xti wilik ruloq'il, wilik rukowiil,</t> <t>ma' nqajik ta kapeew chi riij taqe q'iij naa rojiik wii'.</t>
26: <t>Eh ruuk' taqe i holohik laj na'ojb'al inq'orik</t> <t>eh ruk'uhtaaj i chaq'lamiil.</t>
27: <t>Eh rilom wo' hoq chib'ih taqe i ajwaal wach parupaat.</t> <t>Eh ma' xtaj i ruk'ux chi ma' ta ruk'ax kilem.</t>
28: <t>Eh inye'arik ruloq'il kuum taqe i rak'uun rixq'uun,</t> <t>je' wo' ruum i rub'ahiil je' wili inkiq'or:</t>
29: <t>Wilik wo' taqe ixoq q'e' holohik i kina'ojb'al, xa re' la' re',</t> <t>hat xaq'at kiwach ruuk' i ruholwochiil aana'ojb'al, inki taqe reh.</t>
30: <t>Re' otob'il imb'aan xa neetirujot', re' ruholwochiil ixoq xanik'ik wach.</t> <t>Eh re' ixoq i ruyohleej i Dios, i ruk'ul chi naa ruye'ariik ruloq'il.</t>
31: <t>Chayeew taq ruloq'il chikiwach chu'nchel i tinamit.</t> <t>Eh chayeew wo' taq ruloq'il chu'nchel i rub'an.</t>
